title: Dead Drop
description: Before the botched dead drop, Gabriel Linden was the ultimate insider, the guy sent by the CIA to clean up all its biggest messes. But things went wrong, and now heâ€™s a remora attached to the underbelly of the international intelligence industry, fighting for scraps and serving as an AdultFriendFinder for the violent and pathological, a matchmaker for psychopaths and criminals looking to do a little dirty business. Until the CIA needs the ultimate outsider to save it. Now Gabriel and his partner find themselves on a race around the globe to stop a shadowy North Korean known only as Phoenix from murdering American spies and completing his mission to infiltrate the highest levels of the US government. But they may already be too late. DEAD DROP is an explosive, fast-paced thriller in the vein of Barry Eisler and Daniel Silva.
author: Raymond Thorn
